data.actual_result: Search bar is displayed in past language until you refresh again. Note: This doesn't occur with the Bans search bar in Server Settings
data.expected_result: Search bar is displayed in the language you're now using
data.short_description: Search bar in Members in Server Settings stays in your past language after switching to a different language
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch your client's language to another - Enter Members in a server's Server Settings and observe
